comments.text: This is to track work on integrating Fx-iOS with Glean, including adding the legacy telemetry client id to Glean, so this will include the necessary data reviews for both the basic integration and the addition of the legacy telemetry client id.

Datareview request for Firefox for iOS

Hi Nicole, chutten said to flag you for review.  I'd like to have this by the end of the week so please let me know if that's not reasonable for you.

comments.creator: tlong@mozilla.com
comments.author: tlong@mozilla.com
nshadowen@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Comment on attachment 9147752
Datareview request for Firefox for iOS

Per our conversation on Slack Travis, please ensure that link to Glean generated docs get added to the Firefox iOS main telemetry docs. So long as that is complete, data review as follows. Thanks!

DATA COLLECTION REVIEW RESPONSE:

    Is there or will there be documentation that describes the schema for the ultimate data set available publicly, complete and accurate?

Yes. This collection will be linked to in the Firefox for iOS’s main telemetry docs [Mozilla’s Telemetry Service Pings](https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/blob/master/Docs/telemetry.md). The Glean documentation for these pings can be found in [Metrics collected by the Glean SDK](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/collected-metrics/metrics.html?highlight=baseline#baseline).

    Is there a control mechanism that allows the user to turn the data collection on and off?

Yes. Firefox for iOS provides a preference for telemetry labeled "Send Usage Data" that will be used as the opt-out mechanism.

    If the request is for permanent data collection, is there someone who will monitor the data over time?

Yes, :travis_ is responsible.

    Using the category system of data types on the Mozilla wiki, what collection type of data do the requested measurements fall under?

Category 1, Technical. Glean baseline ping and deletion-request ping.

    Is the data collection request for default-on or default-off?

Default on for all channels.

    Does the instrumentation include the addition of any new identifiers?

No.

    Is the data collection covered by the existing Firefox privacy notice?

Yes.

    Does there need to be a check-in in the future to determine whether to renew the data?

No. This collection is permanent.

---
Result: datareview+
comments.creator: nshadowen@mozilla.com

The second attached PR was merged, adding the legacy telemetry id to the deletion-request ping.  Closing this as done!
